definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: This gave the Chinese people a better sense of balance in regard to this-worldlincss and other- worldliness .
sentences.chinese: 這使得中國人對於入世和出世具有良好的平衡感。

sentences.english: All patients recovered after operation except 1 case died of diabetes insipidus.
sentences.chinese: 絕大多數患者手術後恢復良好，僅1例死於尿崩症。

sentences.english: Ads close to top-of-the-page headlines did well.
sentences.chinese: 靠近頁頂標題的廣告表現良好。

sentences.english: Simulations have been made to validate the good separation performance of the algor…
sentences.chinese: 仿真驗證對聲音等非平穩信號具有良好的分離效果。

sentences.english: Under the condition of artificial feeding, effect of using cement quadrel to collect eggs was good.
sentences.chinese: 在人工飼養條件下，利用水泥方磚採卵效果良好。

sentences.english: Conclusion Heavy-moxibustion is a good method for constipation after stroke.
sentences.chinese: 結論重灸法是治療中風後便祕的良好方法。

sentences.english: Good ability for listening , speaking , reading and writing english.
sentences.chinese: 良好的英語聽說讀寫能力爲佳。

sentences.english: Independent, self-motivated, enthusiasm and well organized with analytical mind.
sentences.chinese: 獨立，自我激勵，積極性和良好的分析能力，組織。

sentences.english: It suggested that SM could be regarded as a good exogenous scavenger of oxygen free radical.
sentences.chinese: 提示丹蔘可作爲一良好的外源性氧自由基清除劑。

sentences.english: The experiment proves that the freshness of valuation data impacts the evaluation computation and the new algorithm is effective tot…
sentences.chinese: 算法應用於學生評教數據的處理，取得了良好的效果。

sentences.english: The research was conducted in rhesus monkeys, which are considered an excellent model of human drug users.
sentences.chinese: 研究所用的恆河猴被認爲是人類藥癮者的良好模型。

sentences.english: It is proved that the improved tee distributor runs well in production practice.
sentences.chinese: 改進後的三通分料器使用效果良好。

sentences.english: The results showed that the cathode pastes obtained can be satisfied with the request of user.
sentences.chinese: 經用戶對陰極糊的實際使用，效果良好。

sentences.english: Grasping the "Five Constructions", Promoting the "Three Services", Setting up Good Image.
sentences.chinese: 抓“五項建設”，促“三個服務”，樹良好形象。

sentences.english: We're looking forward to doing the same here in China.
sentences.chinese: 我希望在中國大陸的網聚也能有這種良好互動。

sentences.english: Buy vehicles with low NOX emissions, and maintain all vehicles well.
sentences.chinese: 購買少產生氮氧化物的汽車，保持汽車的良好狀態。

definition: range (the difference between the lowest and highest values)
to be beneficial/to be good for
